Author: skeletonss-
Text: I used to binge on spoonfuls of brown sugar all the time! Then I replaced it with monkfruit and now I have to constantly remind myself that it's 0 cal cause I still panic once I've had like 1/4 cup

Author: menalit
Text: i used to eat sugar, too. discipline is difficult, but it definitely helps to build confidence. i never ever became obese. but i did have eating issues until pretty late in life. happy to say that it does get better if you want it to.
